imitate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to copy the way someone behaves, speaks, moves etc, especially in order to make people laugh
imitate.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She was a splendid mimic and loved to imitate Winston Churchill.
imitate.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to copy something because you think it is good
imitate.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The Japanese have no wish to imitate Western social customs and attitudes.
